# The Constants Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This section contains APIs for interacting with <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> that correspond to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">llvm::Constant</a> instances. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This section contains APIs for interacting with <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> that correspond to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">llvm::Constant</a> instances.

These functions will work for any <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">llvm::Constant</a> class hierarchy.

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### LLVMConstAllOnes() {#ga594d60b666d0301aaba804918c338687}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMConstAllOnes (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> Ty)</>}>
Obtain a constant value referring to the instance of a type consisting of all ones.

This is only valid for integer types.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#a4d51384de6e1798bb6aa875aebeea9f0">llvm::Constant::getAllOnesValue()</a>
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>
